name: ChessWithMorgan
0:
”Alexa start morgan chess”
”Alexa ask morgan chess to move knight a three”
”Alexa ask morgan chess to move knight at b one to a three”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: morgan chess
des: The skill plays chess. Chess is unique in a sense because it allows users to make moves with or without the board. With this skills young players can choose lower levels and have a board to make Alexa's moves. More advanced players can play the entire game with Alexa using voice. The skill allows user to select standard times and delays as well as an approximate ELO rating. The game uses stockfish which is a very strong engine.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
